meaning_str.bing:
prep. 包括
v. include的现在分词形式

包括；包括…在内；包含；涵盖；囊括
包括；包含；涵盖；囊括；计入；使成为…的一部分；（include的现在分词）

1.en: Following Gul'dan's desertion and death, part of the Horde, including the death knights, retreated through the Dark Portal to Draenor.
1.cn: 随着古尔丹的叛逃和死亡，部落的一部分，包括这些死亡骑士，经过黑暗之门撤回了德拉诺。

2.en: Maintain the body, including maintaining the parts and connectors, connectors can be connected with a bone plate in the far Department.
2.cn: 保持机构包括保持件和连接件，连接件具有可连接于骨板的远部。

3.en: "I don't see our improving military relationship in this region in the context of any other country, including China, " said Mr Gates.
3.cn: 盖茨表示：“我不认为，我们改善在这一地区的军事关系，与包括中国在内的其它任何国家有关。”

0.en: Lots of people do summer at Sorbonne, including me.
0.cn: 很多人都在那补习，包括我。

1.en: And a number of parties were racing to capture him, including, of course, the United States.
1.cn: 多方组织竞相要捕捉他，其中当然包括美国。

2.en: The show features every type of Chinese entertainment, including, of course, martial arts.
2.cn: 晚会囊括了中国各类娱乐形式，当然包括武术。

3.en: Everything around us, including the girl. Everything is temporary. We are forever.
3.cn: 我们身边的一切，包括那个女孩。都是暂时的。我们才是永恒。

4.en: He saved over a thousand men, including the man who would become my husband as it turned out.
4.cn: 他拯救了一千多个人，其中包括后来成为我丈夫的人。

5.en: You saved five of them. Including the control pillar. Only five? We once had hundreds.
5.cn: 你保住了五根，包括控制柱。只有五根吗，我们以前有上百根的。

6.en: The world had been full of many different plant eaters including the vast balachetherium.
6.cn: 地球上曾出现过许多不同种类的草食动物，包括巨型俾路支兽。

7.en: We will limit her contact with people and keep her powers hidden from everyone, including Anna.
7.cn: 减少她与人们的交往，让她的魔力不被人所知，包括安娜。

8.en: Every part of this building, including the skin on your back, is made to keep you here.
8.cn: 这栋楼里的一切，包括你背后的皮肤，都是为了把你留在这里而存在。

9.en: They've been handing tips gleaned from their surveillance on to other departments, including the DEA.
9.cn: 他们一直把监视过程中收集到的信息传达给其他部门，包括缉毒局。

10.en: But then you made reference to something about two very close friends that's nobody's business, including yours.
10.cn: 但你提到了两个非常亲密的朋友的事这不关任何人的事，包括你。

11.en: Your father was captain of a starship for 12 minutes. He saved 800 lives, including your mother's and yours.
11.cn: 你的父亲当了12分钟舰长，他救了800条命，包括你们母子俩的。

12.en: This ski resort in the desert, features five ski runs, including the world's first indoor black diamond slope.
12.cn: 这个沙漠上的滑雪渡假村设有5种滑道，包括全球第一条室内黑钻雪道。

13.en: They sculpted the very surface of the Earth and they drove the evolution of all animals including our own ancestors.
13.cn: 植物刻画出地球每一寸肌肤推动了动物的进化，包括我们人类的鼻祖。

14.en: No, you don't. And just think about the resources, including time that would be spent trying to get back here.
14.cn: 对，没错，再想想将要消耗的资源，包括时间，在试图回到这里的过程中。

15.en: Sully, watch the news. You're a hero. Everyone's gonna have to get used to it, including the NTSB.
15.cn: 萨利，看看新闻，你成了英雄，每个人都要对此习以为常，包括国家运输安全委员会。

16.en: The DA's office will then consider leniency in any charges related to the case. Including first-degree murder.
16.cn: 之后地检署会根据你的指控酌情考虑宽大处理的。可能包括一级谋杀的指控。

17.en: We're leading global efforts to address climate change including last month's joint announcement with China.
17.cn: 我们领导着全球解决气候变化问题的努力，包括上个月和中国所发表的联合宣言。

18.en: Hey, you guys, listen, this weekend we're all gonna go to Las Vegas to surprise Joey. Including me. You wanna go?
18.cn: 注意，这周末大家一起去拉斯维加斯，给乔伊一个惊喜，包括我！你们要去吗？

19.en: Was that a flask? Yes. I've decided to embrace all of the traditions associated with prom, including spiking the Punch.
19.cn: 那是酒壶吗？是的，我决定接受所有和舞会相关的传统，包括在潘趣酒里掺烈酒。
